text: 🚨 Ukraine's attacks on Russian oil refineries: a justified response or a dangerous escalation? 🤔🏛️ Ukrainian officials defend the strikes as a necessary measure to protect their cities, but the US is critical of the attacks. 🇺🇸🔥 The long-range strikes have hit over a dozen refineries since January, disrupting 10% of Russia's oil refinery capacity. 💪💬 "While Russia is attacking Ukrainians' oil and gas, why shouldn't the Ukrainians attack the Russian oil and gas sector?" - Rep. Austin Scott (R-Ga.) 🤔🚀 The Russian Defense Ministry claims the attacks are in response to Ukraine's drone strikes on refineries and other infrastructure. 💻🌎 The situation highlights the complexities of international relations and the challenges of maintaining alliances. 🌟💭 What do you think? Should Ukraine be allowed to attack Russian oil refineries in response to Russia's attacks inside Ukraine? Share your thoughts! 💬
